summary: This is an email from a DOJ spokesman attaching a draft document titled 'Priorities6.2021.doex' for review, asking for feedback on proposed cases and any omissions. It appears to be internal DOJ communication regarding case priorities.

persons.name: Spokesman United States Department of Justice
persons.context: Sender of the email attaching a draft priorities document for review.

keyFacts: Internal DOJ email dated June 2, 2021 regarding case priorities.
Attached draft document 'Priorities6.2021.doex' suggests ongoing planning of cases.
Email seeks review of proposed cases and identification of any omissions.
Originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
